message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18,000. What do you think?

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000 for the product. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I understand that $12,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a price of $16,000 for the product. I think it's a fair compromise considering the value it holds for you. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit too far apart on the price. I'm willing to go up to $13,500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it holds for me. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $14,000, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $14,000. I'm willing to go up to $13,800 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it holds for me. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $14,200, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $13,500, but I think that's as high as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one final offer of $14,500. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to explore other options. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to pay $14,500. I'm willing to meet you at $13,200 for the product. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options, including buying the product from John for $8,000.
